function.name: heatingTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the heating temperature of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the heating temperature.

predefinedHeatingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of the predefined heating temperature.

heatingTemperature.description: The value of the heating temperature to set.
